Articles.Content: I have just installed scatterer, and I am running KSP 1.0.5 beta, with 8GB of ram. When I fire up KSP, and I click "resume saved," it won't let me get back into the mission. Everything is fine, Kerbin is rotating the kerbals are still floating around, but the "continue" button has lost its effect.
I think it'd be better if you asked in the Scatterer thread where people can actually help you (including the dev himself).
